text: (bad‌ril) errumuttiya a rant vibhagannalil tirccayayum ninnalkkearu drstantamunt‌. oru vibhagam allahuvinre margattil yud'dham ceyyunnu. maruvibhagamakatte satyanisedhikalum. (avisvasikalkk‌) tannalute drstiyil avar (visvasikal) tannalute irattiyuntennan teanniyirunnat‌. allahu tan uddesikkunnavarkk tanre sahayam keant pinbalam nalkunnu. tirccayayum kannullavarkk atil oru gunapathamunt‌
